item.title: The Calder贸n Problem
item.description:
Title: The Calder贸n problem.
Speaker: Lina Fajardo Gomez.
Date: Thursday, February $13^{th}$
Time: 11:00am
Place: CIS 1023
Abstract: What do oil drilling and tumor detection have in common? How could nonlinear equations be easier to work with? The Calder贸n problem was first introduced as an inverse boundary value problem: how information about the boundary of a domain can be used to determine information about its interior. We will discuss the set up, some applications, and a proposed solution for a class of Calder贸n type inverse problems.
